scripts.angular: cd angular && npm i && npm start
scripts.postinstall: openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yml -g aspnetcore -o ./server && openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yml -g typescript-rxjs -o ./shared/src/generated/hello-world
scripts.react: cd react && npm i && npm start
scripts.server: cd server && docker build -t backend-server -f ./src/Org.OpenAPITools/Dockerfile . && docker run -d -p 5000:8080 backend-server
scripts.shared: cd shared && npm i && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run shared" "npm run svelte" "npm run react" "npm run angular"
scripts.svelte: cd svelte && npm i && npm run dev
